It is part of Statius's equipment, a set of Ancient Warriors' equipment, and is dropped by any monster found in the Wilderness as part of a global loot table, the chance being relative to the combat level of the monster.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Statius's platelegs
 This item can only be obtained during seasonal Deadman mode tournaments.
It may not be currently obtainable. Players cannot obtain this item in the live game.

Item ID22631

Statius's platelegs is a piece of armour exclusive to Deadman seasonals, requiring 78 Defence to wear. It is part of Statius's equipment, a set of Ancient Warriors' equipment, and is dropped by any monster found in the Wilderness as part of a global loot table, the chance being relative to the combat level of the monster.

 Attack bonuses
+3+3+5-21-7
 Defence bonuses
+110+106+97-4+121
 Other bonusesSlot
+3+0+0%+0List

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
6 December 2018
(update)

The item was made untradeable on the Grand Exchange.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Ancient Warriors' equipment were originally added in a 2008 update, a year after the backup of Old School RuneScape.
  • Unlike its original incarnation, it does not degrade.

[[File:Statius's platelegs detail.png|110px|left]]
'''Statius's platelegs''' is a piece of armour exclusive to [[Deadman Mode#Seasonals|Deadman seasonals]], requiring 78 [[Defence]] to wear. It is part of [[Statius's equipment]], a set of [[Ancient Warriors' equipment]], and is dropped by any monster found in the [[Wilderness]] as part of a global loot table, the chance being relative to the combat level of the monster.

{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes

}}
{{Subject changes footer}}

==Trivia==
*[[Ancient Warriors' equipment]] were originally added in a 2008 {{RSL|Update:PvP Worlds|update}}, a year after the backup of ''Old School RuneScape''.
*Unlike its {{RSL|Statius's platelegs|original incarnation}}, it does not degrade.
